Actions.Text: REFERRED TO ETHICS AND INTERNAL GOVERNANCE
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO ETHICS AND INTERNAL GOVERNANCE
REFERRED TO ETHICS AND INTERNAL GOVERNANCE

Title: Modifies the term "reportable business relationship" as it relates to certain employees of the state university of New York and the city university of New York
Summary: Modifies the term "reportable business relationship" as it relates to certain employees of the state university of New York and the city university of New York where their only form of state employment is with the state university of New York or city university of New York.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the legislative law, in relation to the term "reportable business relationship" as it relates to certain employees of the state university of New York and the city university of New York
